channel.description: Recent content in 2017-07-27 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 27 Jul 2017 00:00
item.description:
Liked: Not giving up on IndieWeb

I know this only an ego trip, but I’d like to get back to having comments enabled on my website. That part is actually quite easy. There is a good Comments plugin for Grav that I have tested locally and it does a nice job.

Srikanth Perinkulam
item.content:encoded:
Liked: Not giving up on IndieWeb

I know this only an ego trip, but I’d like to get back to having comments enabled on my website. That part is actually quite easy. There is a good Comments plugin for Grav that I have tested locally and it does a nice job.

Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 27 Jul 2017 00:00
item.description:
The search for the Alabama sturgeon. Reminded me of the incredible documentary on How wolves can alter the course of a river.

Podcast: Science of Survival Ep. 19: A Very Scary Fish Story

The swamps of Alabama are one of the most biodiverse places on earth. They’ve been called America’s Amazon for the remarkable number of species of fish, turtles, mussels, and other aquatic creatures.

Srikanth Perinkulam
